About

We grown up!

  • Imagine A World With Enough Water For Everyone.
  • Research has proven that we cannot control or change our behaviour without measurement. Most people are able to bring down their consumption by upto 35% after metering. And, this is what drives us to innovate
  • We enhance innovation based on our experience. We ensure that our products & services remain unobtrusive, stay relevant and deliver ‘untapped’ value.
